column2: "My my, you returned so quickly. And here I thought I had set you a most difficult task."
"Hm... What in the world is this? One of nature's mistakes, you say? It's... It's so slimy! It's positively revolting! It..."
"...Heh, hehe. hahaha! It's terrible! How can you present me with something like this and still keep a straight face?"
"Somehow, laughing out loud like that makes things not seem so bad. Could I have been the one making the mistake all along?"

"Hehe...
I will cherish this \"mistake\" forever.
...Thank you, sincerely."
